chart_description: This chart shows the CPU utilization of Netdata workers running the aclkquery module. It indicates how busy the workers are, with 100% representing all workers being fully utilized.

dimension_descriptions.average: The average CPU utilization of the Netdata workers running the aclkquery module.
dimension_descriptions.max: The maximum CPU utilization of the Netdata workers running the aclkquery module.
dimension_descriptions.min: The minimum CPU utilization of the Netdata workers running the aclkquery module.
